summary: Dmitry is an experienced science communicator and science policy analyst with a specialisation in research evaluation. He has worked in both academic and business environments in Russia, Spain, UK and the Netherlands. Dmitry received his most recent master's degree in science and technology policy at the University of Sussex as a UK government-sponsored scholar.
